item.description:
February was so short we didn't even have a meetup! Actually, I tried to schedule this the day of the blizzard, and wasn't sure the place was still in business (wasn't coming up on Meetup and they have no website). I couldn't call them since businesses were closed, and then I forgot about it. Anyway, enough excuses. Everyone loves AYCE, so your wish has been granted. Not as much variety as Sushi Palace, but it's worth checking out.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*** We collect a small fee of $1.00 per guest to offset the monthly charge for running the meetup. It is very much appreciated! ***

Here is a link to their Yelp reviews:

http://www.yelp.com/biz/dragon-house-northhaven#query:sushi%20all%20you%20can%20eat

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: All-you-can-eat Strikes Again!
